casebody.data:
STATE
v.
Jospeh GILL 416P18-1 Supreme Court of North Carolina. November 21, 2018 Thomas F. Loflin, III, Attorney at Law, Durham, for Gill, Joseph. Zachary Padget, Assistant Attorney General, Roger A. Echols, District Attorney, for State of North Carolina.

The following order has been entered on the motion filed on the 21st of November 2018 by State of NC for Temporary Stay:

*88"Motion Allowed by order of the Court in conference, this the 21st of November 2018."
